3.6 The DUIM-OLE-SERVER module

frame-in-place-active?

Function

Summary

Returns true if the server application is running as an in-place activation, and false otherwise.

Signature

frame-in-place-active? frame => active?

Arguments

frame
An instance of <embeddable-frame>.

Values

active?
An instance of <boolean>.

Library

duim-ole-server

Module

duim-ole-server

Description

Returns true if the server application is running as an in-place activation, and false otherwise. Call this function to determine whether your application is currently running in place.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
